1.content:
Our story begins with Clover, Alex, and Sam sitting in their History class, bored off their asses.

"You know, why do we sit through this class every day? We're like, secret agents. We could just drop out of school and make that our job!" commented Clover.

"You idiot, then it wouldn't be a secret anymore!" snapped the always level-headed Sam

"But, it would be nice to have something exciting happen to us...besides our missions. Even those are beginning to be as drab as Mandy's fashion sense."

The girls all agreed on this and chuckled at the Mandy comment.

But unbeknown to them, an evil figure lurks in the shadows...a figure known only as Diminutive Smalls. Unknown to the girls, he had his henchmen inject tiny nano-machines into the girl's bodies during their various battles, just in case his fool-proof plan failed...and it did.

"I may not have gotten to shrink the world, but I'll take great pleasure in shrinking the 3 of you..."

As she nodded off to sleep, she began to dream of a date with the sexiest man on the planet, Chad Hamilton.

"Oh Chad...take me in your arms."

"Whoa, what just happened..." she said to herself as she groggily awoke.

She looked around in a daze as she noticed she wasn't in her classroom anymore. She seemed to be in a soft pink cavern, with intricate curve on the side.

"Like, wow...this is a totally messed up dre..AHH!" she screamed a she noticed that she hadn't a thing on.

"W-why am I not wearing anything? This is so not cool.."

She took a few steps around the strange cavern until she came to a huge curved wall, which seemed to have a crack at the bottom. She then noticed a large billboard right above the crack.

"What the...mooL fo eht tuirF? What kind of weirdness is this...wait.."

She started to piece it together as fast as her blonde brain could manage it. That's it! It was Fruit of the Loom backwards...hmm, that's the brand she wore today and she remembered picking out a cute pink pair...

"Oh no, like, this couldn't be where I think it is.."

She quickly climbed under the crack and unfortunately she was right; she was just inside her own giant panties. But that wasn't the worst part. As she looked around, she realized she was in her classroom standing on a pile of her own clothes...only everything was about 20x too big...

"If my clothes are big, and the classroom's big, then that means...Like, oh my god, I've shrunk! I can't be more than a few inches high!"

She had to find help...but no one around seemed to be aware of anything. They were lost in the boring lecture of the teacher.

"Ok, I'm a spy...I deal with weird stuff all the time..and I'm no stranger to shrinking. I can do this. Now to decide where to go..."

What she didn't know was why she was left behind. Sam takes out her communicator and prepares to call Jerry when her arm suddenly freezes in place.

"Huh? What... I cant move!"

Sam once again hears the same mysterious laughter from before, only this time she heard it loud and clear.

"Who's there?!"

"Hahahaha! Well well, you dont recognize my voice? Let me give you a hint!"

Against her control, Sam began to walk over to the fridge where she kept a pen in a magnet holder. She picked it up and watched as her hand began to write in perfect cursive over their clean table top. Sam gasped when she saw what she was spelling out.

Diminutive Smalls

"Smalls? Your behind this?!"

"Thats right! Ive stolen the shrinking sub right from under WHOOPS stuck up noses and am now using it to completely control your brain! With you under my control there is no hope for your friends to stop me when you and I take over WHOOP then the world! MWAHAHAHA!!!"

*Meanwhile, Clover and Alex had been blown out of the tube and landed hard on the couch in front of Jerrys desk.

"AH! Jerry! You just messed up my hair even more!", cried Clover.

Jerry sighed and rolled his eyes.

"Wait... wheres Sam?",asked Alex.

"Girls I've called you here because Diminutive Smalls has escaped prison and stolen the submarine used by Dr.V from our vaults. We have tracked the subs unique energy signature to your home and have reason to believe that Smalls has shrunken down and infiltrated Sams body."

The girls react with shock.

"That little creep is inside Sam? Ew thats so gross.", said Alex.

"What do we do Jer?"

"The mission is to shrink both of you down so you can enter Sams body and stop Smalls. Since apprehending both Dr.V's and Smalls technology from past encounters, WHOOP scientists have managed to whip up new gadgets and tools that will prove useful in this assignment."

Jerry pressed a button on his desk and walked over to a wall. The wall rotated to reveal a small armory of tools and gizmos. Jerry approaches a red and yellow suit that resembled Clover's and Alex's spy uniforms except with helmets that resembled that of an astronauts and slightly more padding.

"Firstly, we have our brand new shrinking suits. Outfitted with shrinking technology, titanium fiber, jet boots and an on board tactical computer, these suits will dwindle your size down to as small as a flea and provide protection from stomach acids to laser beams."

"Phew. Good thing about the stomach acids. Im not exactly good with directions when it comes to biology.", Clover joked.

"Yes quite. Here we have laser firing bracelets to use should Smalls attack you. Be careful using these girls. You don't want to hurt Sam. And finally, high intensity tasers disguised as lip stick."

Alex and Clover outfitted themselves and Jerry transported them back to their house in their backyard.

Okay first things first, find Sammy.", said Alex.

The spies stealthily entered their house, ducking and leaping behind furniture until they spotted Sam still in the kitchen.

"There she is!", Clover whispered. "How should we play this?"
15233211112.title: The next morning

152332121.content:
Smalls could barely contain his excitement when he spied the three little thorns in his side eating lunch. They were completely unaware of his presence and the danger that was looming over them. The only real question now was which spy to make his new home.

That Sam girl was definitely an excellent choice. She was intelligent, diligent, and had the confidence of her teammates and WHOOP as a whole. No one would suspect her to house such a formidable adversary such as himself. But at the same time her intelligence might make her more likely to resist his influence.

Then there was that weird one... Alex? From what he remembered she wasn't exactly the sharpest tool in the shed, and like Sam she had the love and trust of her friends and allies. But a feeling in Smalls' gut told him trying to control her would be more trouble than it was worth.

That meant the only option left was the blonde... Clover. Oh he remembered her very well considering he made her doll sized once. Good times. She wasn't the brightest crayon in the box either, but she wasn't stupid and her friends trusted her with their lives. She was the perfect balance. She'd make cozy little host.

"She'll do nicely." Smalls chuckled sinisterly.

With his mind made up, he made his move.

1523322.title: Other story concepts

info.brief_description: The Spies go about their "normal" lives, until an old foe spices things up...
info.description:
Our lovable heroines go about their daily lives, until their old nemesis Diminuitive Smalls (Clover shrink episode) pays them a visit from behind the scenes. Chaos ensues as one or more of the Spies are once again brought down to size.

I thought this story would be fun to do, since the spies are such airheads. It's also a chance to show the more sexual part of their attitudes (they are teenagers always chasing after boys after all). So feel free to add any adult things, or just adventurous parts with them having to make by with their now smaller spy gadgets.

Add chapters damnit! I'm tired of adding to my own story.
